attributes.action: consider Mr Bruce Joseph Forsyth Johnson CBE, entertainer, for a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Considering that, Mr. Bruce Forsyth has been entertaining the British Public for over 67 years and given his time generously to charity. I would urge the Prime Minister to elevate this hugely popular entertainer to the title of 'Sir Bruce Forsyth'

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
